other_tests.findings: Appendix dilated up to 1.3 cm with hyperemic and thickened walls and periappendiceal stranding, consistent with acute appendicitis. Pancreatic duct dilated up to 8 mm in the head, new from the previous study. Numerous bilateral renal hypodensities, and an exophytic lesion at the right inferior pole measuring 1.8 cm of indeterminate density. Moderate hiatal hernia observed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Pancreatic duct dilated up to 8 mm in the head, new from the previous study.
